Description: Rim and wall sherd of East Greek pottery plate or shallow dish; highly micaceous clay. Inside slipped cream; band between lines of top of rim; black band with added red band at edge of floor; to the inside, dot and square metopal frieze between lines; three lines preserved to the centre; exterior: edge of rim glazed, two bands on wall.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.305)
